title: hirni: test_demo_repro_analysis failure in recent PRs
body:
`datalad_hirni.tests.test_demos.test_demo_repro_analysis` has failed in two unrelated PRs (gh-5534, gh-5539).  It's reliably showing up in gh-5534, enough that I thought it must be a non-obvious interaction with those changes, but then it popped up in another PR, gh-5539.  I can't trigger it locally, and it's not consistently happening in PRs (aside from maybe gh-5534).

Any ideas what could be going here, @bpoldrack?

<summary>error</summary>
